description: Tattooed hunk Pierre Fitch loves his hunky, beefy man William Seed, but he hates that William always thinks he’s cheating. Ripped Pierre decides to prank him with a fake blow up doll, and makes it seem like he’s fucking someone in the shower. Green-eyed William arrives home to find him, and goes crazy before realizing it was all a joke. Pierre reassures the stud that the only big dick he wants pumping his tight hole is William’s!
title: When The Top's Away: Part 2
